messages.notFound: I couldn't find the command "{{command}}". Try `{{prefix}}help`. (If you don't want your message to be treated as a command, add a \\ before it.)
messages.nothing: You actually need to specify a command (shocker). If you don't want your message to be treated as a command, add a \\ before it.
messages.backoff: You have been running too many commands at once. Please try again in a minute.
messages.alreadyRunning: You already have a command running. Try again later.
